data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dnestrovskaya, Nataliya Yu., Jirkov, Igor A. (2019): Redescription of Micronephthys longicornis (Perejaslavtseva, 1891) (Annelida: Nephtyidae). Zootaxa 4550 (3): 391-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4550.3.6
